#library and data
```{r}
library(rgdal)
library(leaflet)
library (raster)  
map <- readOGR("newmap.shp")
```

#Read file
```{r}
class(map)
length(map)
extent(map)
crs(map)
head(map)
```


# leaflet visualization
```{r}

map%>% 
  leaflet() %>%
  addPolygons(color = "#444444", weight = 1, smoothFactor = 0.5,
    opacity = 1.0,
    highlightOptions = highlightOptions(color = "white", weight = 2,
      bringToFront = TRUE),
    popup =  paste("Route: ", map$route, "<br>"))
```
